channel.title: AVS Origami's Blog
channel.description: The latest blog posts from avs-origami.github.io

item.title: Tiny robots
item.description: A bit of a rant on why tiny robots are so great (or at least why I think they're so great).

item.title: Folding some origami insects
item.description: What to do with new origami paper? That's right, bugs.

item.title: Shared memory IPC in Rust
item.description: A foray into unsafe Rust using shared memory for ultra-fast interprocess communication. Complete with examples!

item.title: Installing Kiss Linux
item.description: A bit about my journey into installing Kiss Linux for the first time in the form of an annotated installation guide.
